order.title: Order Settings

giftCoupon.title: Gift Coupon
giftCoupon.description: Allow customers to enter a coupon code on the checkout page.

giftPackage.title: Gift Package Service
giftPackage.description: You can offer gift packages for free or for a price.

excludeVAT.title: Exclude VAT from Prices
excludeVAT.description: Show product prices excluding VAT on the product pages.

identityRequired.title: Turkish ID Number
identityRequired.description: Make Turkish ID number required for orders.

userStatus.title: User Status
userStatus.description: Allow manual adjustment of user status during registration.

forceRegister.title: Force Registration
forceRegister.description: Require users to sign up before placing orders.

noteActive.title: Order Note
noteActive.description: Allow customers to add notes on the order page.

restockOnCancel.title: Restock on Cancel
restockOnCancel.description: Return cancelled order products back to stock.

orderNoteText.title: Order Note Info
orderNoteText.description: Text shown under the order note input field.

invoiceSerial.title: Invoice Serial Number
invoiceSerial.description: Text to appear on the invoice.

separateItems.title: Separate Items
separateItems.description: Use this to separate identical products in the cart.

priceBased.title: Price-Based Sorting
priceBased.description: Use this to sort products based on their price.

minAmount.title: Minimum Order Amount (TRY)
minAmount.description: Prevent customers from placing orders below this amount.

order.requiredOrderFieldsTitle: Which fields should be required on the order page?
order.requiredFastSaleFieldsTitle: Which fields should be required on the fast sale screen?

category.infoText1: You can drag and drop a category under another category.

matching.info:
You can match misspelled search terms with correct ones to help your visitors find what they‚Äôre looking for.
Example: match 'tishirt' or 'ti≈ü√∂rt' to 't-shirt'.

match.categoryInfo: You can match your existing categories with marketplace categories.
match.featureInfo: You can also match the marketplace features of matched categories.
match.variantInfo: You can also match the variants of your matched categories.

suggestion.name: Full Name
suggestion.modalInfo: You can add ready-made titles for product suggestions.

default.title: Default SEO Settings
default.description: You can set default SEO information of your site by filling in the fields below.

promotion.name: Description
promotion.newInfo: Please select the type of promotion you want to create. Promotion settings are configured after creation.

sms.name: Name
sms.phoneInfo: Phone number must include country code. Example: +905001234567

slider.title: Slide Management
slider.dragInfo: You can reorder slides by drag and drop.

popup.title: Popup
popup.warning: You can restrict popup visibility using the fields below.

risky.infoText: If an order matches any of the fields below, it will be marked as 'Risky Order'.
risky.criteriaInfoText: You can control orders based on predefined automatic risk criteria.
risky.name: Full Name

balance.title: Balance Settings
balance.walletDescription: You can enable/disable wallet balance payments

password.info: In bulk password sending, a new password is generated for all active dealers and sent to their email addresses. To complete this process, Mailjet setup must be completed from 'Settings ‚Üí Email Settings'.
password.errorMessage: This action cannot be performed in the demo account!

marketplaces.title: Marketplace Stores
marketplaces.description: You can define your stores on marketplaces, set profit margins and restrictions.

subtitles.active: The following integrations are currently active.
subtitles.inactive: The following integrations have not been activated yet.

tabs.description: Content will be shown based on selected tab.

marketplaceBatch.title: Bulk Marketplace Operations
marketplaceBatch.warning: Before starting the product pull operation, it is recommended to disable 'Product Update' and 'Product Delete' from 'Integrations ‚Üí Marketplace Integrations'.

excel.title: Export Products to Excel
excel.description: You can convert your products to Excel format via Hepsiburada integration.

activate.title: Activate Products
activate.description: Activate matched products in the selected store.

monitor.title: Marketplace Monitor
monitor.description: You can review the update status and error reports of your products on marketplaces.

updated.title: Updated Products
updated.description: You can view your updated products and their dates.

pending.title: Pending Products
pending.description: You can view products that are queued for update and their scheduled times.

errors.title: Error Reports
errors.description: You can view the errors encountered when adding, updating, or deleting products.

theme.cookieInfo: The cookie module appears at the top (header) or bottom (footer) of your site.
theme.cookieWarningNote: This area will be hidden once accepted by the visitor.
theme.tabAlertDescription: With the tab alert, you can change the title when the tab changes.
theme.facebookInstruction: Set up Facebook application settings as follows:
theme.googleInstruction: Create a project from Google Console
theme.cookieDefaultText: Cookies are used on this website. Click to review our cookie policy.
theme.siteMainDescription: The standard logo of your site.
theme.mobileLogoDescription: Logo to be used for mobile platforms.
theme.footerLogoDescription: Logo that will appear in the footer.
theme.emailLogoDescription: Logo to be used in email templates.
theme.faviconDescription: The small icon visible in the browser tab.

module.dragDropInfo: You can reorder groups by drag and drop.

templatePage.info1: You can edit your templates by clicking the buttons below.
templatePage.info2: You can upload the invoice image to the 'Paper Sample' section.

contracts.description1: You can edit the contracts by clicking the buttons below.
contracts.description2: Contracts are used during member registration and order steps.

country.name: Name

settings.label: Dealer Application Page
settings.description: If active, dealers can submit applications.

settings.label: Open Account Negative Balance Limit (0: unlimited)
settings.description: Specifies the negative limit for dealer open balances.

settings.label: Only Approved Dealers Can Log In
settings.description: If active, only approved dealers can access the system.

settings.label: Use Dropship Dealer Shipping Template
settings.description: Special shipping template for dropshipping dealers.

settings.label: Negative Stock Limit
settings.description: Sets the minimum stock amount for dealers to place orders.

settings.label: Negative Stock Limit in Cart
settings.description: Sets the minimum stock amount for items added to the cart.

settings.label: Dealer Price Type (Default)
settings.description: Select the default price type shown to dealers.

settings.label: Negative Stock Limit for Members
settings.description: Sets the minimum stock amount for members to place orders.

settings.label: Cart Negative Stock Limit for Members
settings.description: Sets the minimum stock amount for items members can add to cart.

settings.label: Negative Stock Limit for Visitors
settings.description: Sets the minimum stock amount for visitors to place orders.

settings.label: Cart Negative Stock Limit for Visitors
settings.description: Sets the minimum stock amount for items visitors can add to cart.

settings.label: Include Dealer Orders in Dealer Movements
settings.description: Enables viewing dealer orders in dealer movement history.

settings.label: Minimum Order Amount Requirement for Dealers
settings.description: Enforces a minimum order amount for dealers.

settings.label: Dealer Minimum Order Amount (TRY)
settings.description: Sets the required minimum order amount for dealers.

dealerXml.title: Dealer XML Settings

hasSubscription.title: Enable XML Subscription
hasSubscription.desc: Defines the subscription to be time-based.

hasPayments.title: Enable XML Payments
hasPayments.desc: Dealers must pay for XML subscription.

requireIP.title: Require IP Authorization for XML
requireIP.desc: Only allowed IPs can access XML.

autoActivate.title: Auto Enable XML for New Dealers
autoActivate.desc: Automatically enables XML for new dealer registrations.

dealerXml.minStock: Minimum Stock (Anything below will be sent as 0)

allowedIPs.title: Allowed IP List (One per line)
allowedIPs.desc: Enter IP addresses allowed to access XML.

smsTemplates.title: SMS Templates
smsTemplates.selectLabel: Please select the SMS sending action

languages.title: Languages
languages.name: Name
languages.exportInfo: All data in the translation center will be exported as Excel.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.modeDescription: Enable maintenance mode to block visitor access to the site.
maintenance.adminAccessDescription: Allows administrators to access the site while in maintenance mode.
maintenance.noteDescription: You can edit the message shown to visitors while the site is in maintenance mode.

verification.title: Search Engine Verification
verification.desc: Helps verify your store on Google, Facebook, Yandex, Bing, Alexa, and Pinterest and improves indexing speed.

robots.title: Robots.txt
robots.desc: The robots.txt file defines how search engine bots should behave on your site.

analytics.title: Google Analytics
analytics.desc: Track your visitor statistics and behavior using Google Analytics.

metrica.title: Yandex Metrica
metrica.desc: Track your visitor statistics and behavior using Yandex Metrica.

ads.title: Google Ads
ads.desc: Track your ad campaign performance with Google Ads integration.

html.title: Head-Body HTML Codes
html.desc: Add your HTML code between <head> or before </body>.

customCodes.title: Custom Marketing Codes
customCodes.desc: Add tracking, conversion, and remarketing codes. This may require advanced knowledge.

tawkto.title: tawk.to
tawkto.desc: Add Tawk.to live chat to engage with visitors in real-time.

productSettings.title: Product Settings
productSettings.shippingDescription:
If you place the order before 6:00 PM, your order will be shipped the same day and delivered the next day.

If you place the order after 6:00 PM, it will be shipped the next day if in stock.

removeOutOfStock.title: Remove Out-of-Stock Products
removeOutOfStock.description: Automatically deactivate products when stock reaches zero.

marketplaceStock.title: Marketplace-Specific Stock
marketplaceStock.description: Enable separate stock values for marketplaces.

passiveCategory.title: Passive Category Products
passiveCategory.description: Deactivate products when the parent category is deactivated.

searchFields.title: Search Fields
searchFields.description: Specify searchable fields (e.g., Product Name, Code, Barcode).

hidePrices.title: Hide Product Prices
hidePrices.description: Enable this to hide product prices on the site.

fastLoadCategories.title: Load Categories from Memory
fastLoadCategories.description: Cache categories for 1 day to improve load speed.

stockLimit.title: Stock Threshold
stockLimit.description: Unlist products that fall below this stock limit.

requireImage.title: Image Requirement
requireImage.description: Prevent publishing products without an image.

hideOutOfStock.title: Out-of-Stock Product Display
hideOutOfStock.description: Move out-of-stock products to the bottom of the list.

tckn.label: TCKN / VKN Required
tckn.desc: Require national ID or tax number input.

telefon.label: Phone Required
telefon.desc: Phone number field must be filled in.

shippingSettings.title: Shipping Settings
shippingSettings.rule1: Fixed shipping fees are added to the cart total.
shippingSettings.rule2: Category-based fees are added per item in the cart.
shippingSettings.rule3: A product cannot have fixed, category and desi-based fees simultaneously.
shippingSettings.rule4: To apply shipping fees, the 'Buyer Pays Shipping' option must be enabled.

addModal.title: New Shipping Company
addModal.description: Please select the shipping company you want to add. If it's not listed, choose 'Other'.

smsSettings.title: SMS Settings
smsSettings.enabledDesc: You can enable this feature to activate SMS sending.
smsSettings.providerDesc: You can choose the SMS provider to be used for sending messages.
smsSettings.titleDesc: Enter the title to be used when sending SMS.
smsSettings.adminPhoneDesc: Enter the admin phone number to be used for SMS notifications.

webService.alert: Web service is not included in your package. Please contact your system administrator to activate it.
